org.mapsforge.android.maps.inputhandling
Class ZoomAnimator

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.mapsforge.android.maps.PausableThread
          org.mapsforge.android.maps.inputhandling.ZoomAnimator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ZoomAnimator
extends PausableThread

A ZoomAnimator handles the zoom-in and zoom-out animations of the corresponding MapView. It runs in a separate thread to avoid blocking the UI thread.

Method Detail

isExecuting

public boolean isExecuting()
Returns:
true if the ZoomAnimator is working, false otherwise.

setParameters

public void setParameters(float zoomStart,
                          float zoomEnd,
                          float pivotX,
                          float pivotY)
Sets the parameters for the zoom animation.

Parameters:
zoomStart - the zoom factor at the begin of the animation.
zoomEnd - the zoom factor at the end of the animation.
pivotX - the x coordinate of the animation center.
pivotY - the y coordinate of the animation center.

startAnimation

public void startAnimation()
Starts a zoom animation with the current parameters.
